content.para: The 3.4.2 release introduces a simple API for building attribute maps and fixes an occasional ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.

tr.td:
Attribute map builders
Java API Example
As of version 3.4.2, API makes it possible to build attribute maps in a type-safe fashion. Please see the example code for details.

Fix for an occasional ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Related issue: CARROT-736

td.p: When versions 3.4.1, 3.4.0 or 3.3.0 of algorithms are used within a pooling controller (ControllerFactory#createPooling()), an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException may occasionally be thrown during initialization or processing. All APIs and tools in version 3.4.1, 3.4.0 and 3.3.0 are affected by this issue. Version 3.4.2 is free from the defect.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.4.2. For more new features, please see release 3.4.0 and release 3.3.0 notes.
